title: Yo-Yo Ma
summary: Yo-Yo Ma (born October 7, 1955) is an American cellist.[2] Born in Paris, France, to Chinese[3] parents and educated in New York City, he was a child prodigy, performing from the age of four and a half. He graduated from the Juilliard School and Harvard University, and has performed as a soloist with orchestras around the world. He has recorded more than 90 albums and received 18 Grammy Awards.
